column4: h-index          Author metrics Scopus is adding an array of metrics for researchers. As an initial step, the h-index has been added.  The h-graph is one way of displaying and comparing the productivity and impact of published work of scholars. It should only be used together with a mix of quantitative and qualitative metrics.  More metrics will be added in the course of the year.
